HouYiPayoutAndRulesShared.BodyHuntFeature1: If one or more Sun symbol appears on the reels, Hou Yi will shoot at the Sun symbol(s).
HouYiPayoutAndRulesShared.BodyHuntFeature2: Each Sun symbol has a chance of being hit and transform into a Wild symbol.
HouYiPayoutAndRulesShared.BodyFreeSpin1: 3 Scatter symbols appearing anywhere on reels 2, 3 and 4 will trigger the Free Spins Feature with 10 free spins.
HouYiPayoutAndRulesShared.BodyFreeSpin2: All free spin wins are multiplied by the value shown below the reels.
HouYiPayoutAndRulesShared.BodyFreeSpin3: At the first free spin of Free Spins Feature, the multiplier value is x1.
HouYiPayoutAndRulesShared.BodyFreeSpin4: After every free spin, the multiplier value will be increased by 1 (up to x10 at the last free spin).
HouYiPayoutAndRulesShared.BodyFreeSpin5: Scatter symbol does not appear during Free Spins Feature.
HouYiPayoutAndRulesShared.GeneralRulesPayoutValue1: Wild symbol substitutes for all symbols except Scatter symbol.
HouYiPayoutAndRulesShared.GeneralRulesPayoutValue2: Scatter symbol appears on reels 2, 3 and 4 only.

HouYiRules.GeneralRules1: Legend of Hou Yi is a 5-reel, 3-row video slot featuring Wild substitutions and Free Spins Feature with increasing multiplier.

GeneralRules2.value: The game is played with 30 bet lines (fixed), bet level of %{minBetMtp} to %{maxBetMtp} and bet size of %{minChip} to %{maxChip}.
GeneralRules2.comment: %{minBetMtp}, %{maxBetMtp}, %{minChip}, %{maxChip} will be minimum bet level, maximum max level, minimum bet size and maximum bet size in numeric form.
GeneralRules2.example: The game is played with 30 bet lines (fixed), bet level of 1 to 10 and bet size of 0.05 to 50.

HouYiRules.GeneralRules17: Free Spins Feature is played at the same bet size and bet level as the spin that triggered the Free Spins Feature.
